MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter.synopsis: Dark Urge wakes up to the corpse of Alfira in camp.If companions are around, you will have some explaining to do.NOTE: Always put Astarion in group slot 2  if there are multiple companions
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter.how_to_trigger: Queue Camp Night NIGHT_DarkUrge_MurderOfAlfiraEnd the DayGo to Bed

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_2.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_2.text: Another waif dead before her time. I wonder how it happened.
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_2.context: NodeContext: [Astarion:waking up with the rest of the party to find a dead body in camp, Less sad, more worried that someone could get so close while everyone slept.]

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_153.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_153.text: You summoned us. You must know something
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_153.context: InternalNodeContext: Remove REALLY_SHADOWHEART tag check if the subnode ends up getting recorded

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_18.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_18.text: And it looks like you've been showering in gore. How'd that happen, huh?

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_87.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_87.text: She was brutalised, the killer knifed her many times after she was dead. Was it you?

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_13.text: I think I must have killed her.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_156.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_156.text: Doesn't exactly take the Fist's best detectives to see that - you're covered in her insides. But why?

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_73.speaker: Narrator
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_73.text: I suddenly woke up in the night, and everything was just like this.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_12.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_12.text: I have had unusual symptoms from my parasite - perhaps this is a side effect of yours?
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_12.context: NodeContext: Karlach: Wanting to convince herself.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_160.speaker: Narrator
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_160.text: *The worm in your head has never slept more peacefully. You know in your heart it was something deeper, hungrier.*

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_21.text: Yeah, it must be the parasite.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_38.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_38.text: Even if the parasite caused your little 'episode', it had better not happen again. People can't just be murdered in camp - some of us are important.
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_38.context: NodeContext: Karlach: With import. This is important.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_56.speaker: Narrator
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_56.text: *An uneasy feeling lingers in the air.*

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_82.speaker: Narrator
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_82.text: *As the inquisition departs, you are left alone with a familiar headache.*

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_83.speaker: Narrator
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_83.text: Mourn: you truly wished to journey beside Alfira.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_36.speaker: Narrator
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_36.text: *One more failed adventurer, gone to the mud now.*

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_14.speaker: Narrator
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_14.text: Vow: you will gain control, you will save the next innocent.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_22.speaker: Narrator
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_22.text: *Every one of your instincts screams against the saccharine thought. You feel close to fainting again...*

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_85.speaker: Narrator
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_85.text: Breathe deeply: you must uncover the cause of your mad spree lest it happen again.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_16.speaker: Narrator
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_16.text: *Much is uncertain, but you know one thing for sure: the darkness will strike again, unless you find a light.*

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_116.speaker: Narrator
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_116.text: Giggle: the only joy greater than murder is to get away with it!

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_157.speaker: Narrator
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_157.context: NodeContext: wry chuckle mocking the Dark Urge

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_113.text: Grind your jaw: that was close - you will hide your crime more carefully next time.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_122.speaker: Narrator
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_122.text: *Something revolts in your churning blood. Why hide what you are? You long to expose yourself.*

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_26.text: I... don't know. It could have been the tadpole.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_74.speaker: Narrator
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_74.text: My body acted outside of my control - it was spasming.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_126.speaker: Narrator
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_126.text: I... I can't remember. I don't know why I did it.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_24.text: She attacked me while I was sleeping - I had to!

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_53.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_53.text: Huh, I never knew she had it in her. But if it was self-defence, I suppose we can look past the mess.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_99.speaker: Narrator
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_99.text: *It appears the lie that passed through your teeth has lifted some fears.*

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_166.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_166.text: Nonsense. The girl was timid as a mouse, and hardly more dangerous.
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_166.context: NodeContext: Karlach: with her teeth set.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_57.text: I don't know what happened. I woke up and she was dead.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_101.text: A wild boar ran rampant in the camp and gored her.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_3.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_3.text: A boar stabbed her dozens of times? With a knife, no less?

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_88.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_88.text: Please, you're covered in gore. I know you did it - I just want to know why.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_102.text: Must have been a feral animal. She was long dead when I got here.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_72.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_72.text: We should do better than this. Be better than this, for those who seek our aid.
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_72.context: NodeContext: [Astarion: thinking of his own late-night hunts]

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_0.text: Astarion must have been feasting on her - I was trying to patch her wounds.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_62.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_62.text: You can't be serious. I had nothing to do with this!

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_127.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_127.text: I'd never be this wasteful, for a start. Her blood's everywhere.
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_127.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion indicates the dead and bloody body.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_107.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_107.text: Need I remind everyone that you're the one drenched in gore?

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_104.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_104.text: I don't think it's a bad look, but it is a very guilty one.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_91.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_91.text: Pointing fingers won't save you. It's clear what happened here.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_54.text: Astarion is twitching with anticipation looking at this body - he must have killed her.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_27.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_27.text: Oh no, you're not pinning this on me. You're the one who found her!

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_39.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_39.text: I hate to accuse one of our own. And yet... it makes sense.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_131.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_131.text: I get all the blame for a gory murder, but I still have to go hungry? Ridiculous. Absolutely ridiculous.
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_131.context: NodeContext: So done with this shit

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_115.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_115.text: This is ridiculous. I get all the blame for a gory murder, but none of the satisfaction of actually killing someone.
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_115.context: NodeContext: So done with this shit

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_119.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_119.text: I've seen spined devils tear apart cattle with more care. This doesn't look like a vampire's work...

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_148.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_148.text: I've been on my best behaviour. You all know it.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_95.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_95.text: Another waif dead before her time. I wonder how it happened.
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_95.context: NodeContext: [Astarion:waking up with the rest of the party to find a dead body in camp, Less sad, more worried that someone could get so close while everyone slept.]

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_151.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_151.text: Did you see something happen? You called for us.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_159.text: I... I can't remember. I don't know why I did it.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_114.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_114.text: What's going on? If something's wrong with you, say it now. This could be your last chance.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_98.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_98.text: That's... unsettling. It could be one of your parasite's games, maybe?

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_66.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_66.text: So where does this leave us? It's hard to trust someone who blacks out and stabs you to death.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_65.text: If you want to leave me, I will understand.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_94.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_94.text: I could, but we have the same parasites - maybe it'll happen to me next. At least together, we can keep an eye on each other.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_146.text: It won't happen again, I promise.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_117.text: She did come into the camp unannounced. Perhaps I did the right thing, even with the amnesia.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_28.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_28.text: Stabbing someone a dozen times can be many things, but 'the right thing' to do? I doubt it.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_152.text: I can't explain it. I am starting to scare myself.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_20.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_20.text: Is it the tadpole? Has it taken control of you?

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_43.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_43.text: I see... That does sound pretty reasonable, actually.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_10.text: The tadpole is doing this to me, I'm sure.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_59.text: She was weak - the world would have killed her sooner or later.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_170.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_170.text: She was an artist. A bard. And even if she was nothing at all, she deserved to live.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_1.text: Now my moment of wrath is over, I do regret it.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_140.text: A wild boar ran rampant in the camp and gored her.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_100.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_100.text: Those are knife wounds, and you know it. A terrifying number of them.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_161.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_161.text: Another waif dead before her time. I wonder how it happened.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_128.text: I... I can't remember. I don't know why I did it.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_141.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_141.text: You don't remember? Why? What's wrong with you?

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_32.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_32.text: I'm just not sure where this leaves us? It's hard to trust someone who blacks out and stabs you to death.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_37.text: It won't happen again, I promise.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_41.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_41.text: It had better not. I don't know if this was the parasite's fault or yours, darling, but I'll keep an extra close eye on you both.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_49.text: I can't explain it. I am starting to scare myself.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_76.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_76.text: Is it the tadpole? Has it taken control of you?

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_52.text: I don't know what happened. I woke up and she was dead.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_129.text: A wild boar ran rampant in the camp and gored her.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_150.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_150.text: Those are knife wounds, and you know it. A terrifying number of them.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_30.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_30.text: Listen, darling -  you're covered in gore. I know you killed her, I just want to know why.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_133.text: Must have been a feral animal. She was long dead when I got here.

MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_9.speaker: Player
MurderOfAlfira_GD_MorningAfter_9.text: How did I sleep through that? Gods, poor Alfira. She must've been terrified.
